Name: [The Sentinel's Nest]
Description: Tactical displays flicker with kill data. A Sentinel Prime stands vigil in this military command post, its systems still running Pre-Glitch patrol protocols. Red targeting lasers sweep the room in methodical patterns.
NarrativeText: The Sentinel Prime is still following orders given 800 years ago: 'Eliminate all unauthorized personnel.' You are unauthorized. It raises its plasma rifle with mechanical precision. Combat is inevitable.
FlavorText: Wall-mounted screens display patrol routes, threat assessments, and kill statistics. Ammunition crates line the walls. A Pre-Glitch military banner hangs torn and faded: 'Victory Through Superior Firepower'. The Sentinel's optical sensors lock onto you with a soft *ping*.
